content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.touch_apps_qt1_mutualcap_xpro_board_sam_l22_xpro
content.displayName: Mutual Capacitance Example for SAM L21/L22 Family
content.shortDescription: MPLAB Harmony 3 Touch Library is a royalty-free software library for developing touch applications on 32-bit microcontrollers using the Peripheral Touch Controller (PTC). Developers can use it to integrate touch-sensing capability into their applications. This example application shows how to use mutual capacitance touch.
content.author: Microchip
subcategories: SAM L22 Xplained Pro Evaluation Kit
